mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jingdian_uuid_number as jingdianUuidNumber ,a.jingdian_name as jingdianName ,a.jingdian_types as jingdianTypes ,a.jingdian_photo as jingdianPhoto ,a.jingdian_kiafangshijian as jingdianKiafangshijian ,a.jingdian_content as jingdianContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jingdian a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.jingdian_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jingdianUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jingdian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jingdianName},'%')
and a.jingdian_types = #{params.jingdianTypes}
and a.jingdian_kiafangshijian like CONCAT('%',#{params.jingdianKiafangshijian},'%')
and a.jingdian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jingdianContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
